backStory: Lives alone on a small terminal island and mostly keeps to himself ignoring the power struggles around him

quests.name: Tomatoes!
quests.text: You look like you're. I'm sure you've got a lot of questions, sadly I don't have that many answers for you. What I can tell you is that there's a lot of dangers around and you won't get far without a weapon. I've got an old wand lying around that you can have if you help me with a little bit of gardening. Bring me back 10 tomatoes and I'll sort you out.
